articles.title: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026
articles.mainIdea: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026. JPMorgan has released its list of 47 top stock picks for 2026 that its analysts believe will crush the market in 2026. They have assigned each stock an overweight rating and given them a one-year price target for 2026. The selections cover a wide range of sectors, including technology, healthcare, financials, energy, and consumer discretionary, ... JPMorgan’s Top 3 Stocks to Crush the Market in 2026 Related tickers mentioned: BFAM, CELH, JPM.

articles.title: Analysts Maintain Positive Outlook on AMD With China Demand as a Catalyst
articles.mainIdea: Analysts Maintain Positive Outlook on AMD With China Demand as a Catalyst
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Analysts Maintain Positive Outlook on AMD With China Demand as a Catalyst. Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the AI Stocks Investors Are Watching. On December 23, Raymond James reiterated the stock as “Outperform,” noting that it has upside following reports that Nvidia plans to resume chip shipments to China. The firm believes that Nvidia and AMD could both see moderate upside from US export […] Related tickers mentioned: AMD, NVDA.
